text: Twiztid are an American hip-hop/horrorcore group from Detroit, Michigan. The group consists of two members: Jamie Madrox and Monoxide. == Albums == Twiztid has released five studio albums: Year Album 1997 Mostasteless 2000 Freek Show 2003 The Green Book 2005 Man's Myth 2010 Heartbroken & Homicidal == Websites == Twiztid's Official website Category:hip hop bands Category:Musical groups from Michigan
title: Twiztid
